You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Dscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D49F.
  * `&dscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4B9.
